name: Grab Your Trash
description:
Grab Your Trash is a versus multiplayer game where you play as a boat. The goal is simple, collect and clean the sea of  the trashes with your hook. But be careful, do not shoot the other boats or the sea animals !

Participants :

Jean-Michel David, Julie Guillaume, Aymen Jemmali, Jonathan Lippert, Youri Lockwood, Bénédicte Marcq, Pierre Van dhelsen, Guylian Woillard.
